Reviews.Title: “We Love Los Itzaes!! Fabulous location, very clean and was perfect!!”
Reviews.Author: trvlbsrb
Reviews.Content: fabulous experience nicest hotels town close safe walk late night walmart 3 blocks stock water supplies awesome service clean comfy loved rooftop pool tan lines pool bit cold didnt matter weather wasnt hot cooler nights kept water cool suppose enjoyed los im travel agent try allinclusive am definitely recommend tour companies offer hotels playa del carmen affordable inclusives restaurants wonderful

Reviews.Content: hotel entryway feels courtyard surrounded hanging gardens french windows onto breezy balcony shower warmed clean fan ac mini fridge safe blowdryer hotel located close quinta beach various nightclubs including coco shop swim enjoy nights sleep dont furnish parking found free spot block lot corner
